long_description: Ruffwear The Beacon pet light adds high-visibility red light around your dog for increased safety in low light and after dark. The Beacon uses an omni-directional, high-intensity LED to provide visibility from different angles. Compact, sturdy design is light, water-tight and easy to use-simply clip to dog's collar, harness, pack or PFD. Features fast flash, slow flash and continuous shine modes. Can also be used as a personal safety beacon while hiking, jogging, biking and boating. Ruffwear The Beacon pet light comes with 2 replaceable lithium coin-cell batteries.
short_description: Ruffwear The Beacon pet light adds high-visibility red light around your dog for increased safety in low light and after dark.
